Question.Subject: why is india backward when it comes to internet services?
Question.Content: USA, UK , japan,......... all have excellent internet services......but WHY is IND poooor these services???????(i.e low speeds or high prices for little higher speeds.....)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Most of the time people use to serf through their office/school/college and very less time remains to serf the net when you are in home.
Thus, due to less demand for personal use, high speed internet market is still unexplored.
When it comes to corporate use we have high speed internet connectivity at resonance price.

Answer.Content:
Most of the time people use to serf through their office/school/college and very less time remains to serf the net when you are in home.
Thus, due to less demand for personal use, high speed internet market is still unexplored.
When it comes to corporate use we have high speed internet connectivity at resonance price.
Change your living.I live in EU , I've got 80Mb/30Mb internet priced ~23$ / month.
